document.full_text: prosecutors and attorneys for the 20-year-old man accused in a series of crimes attributed to the "barefoot bandit" are negotiating a plea deal, a defense lawyer told reuters on thursday.
document.title: "barefoot bandit" suspect in plea negotiations
lines_and_colors: prosecutors and attorneys for the 20-year-old man accused in a series of crimes attributed to the "barefoot bandit" are negotiating a plea deal, a defense lawyer told reuters on thursday.
